sentence.Network_en: At that late stage of life, defibrillation shocks cause discomfort, anxiety, and a prolonged death.
sentence.Network_cn: 在生命最后阶段, 电除颤电休克导致患者不适 、 焦躁以及死亡时间延长.

sentence.Network_en: It is proved by practice, early defibrillation may elevate obviously the successful rate of cardiopulmonary resuscitation.
sentence.Network_cn: 实践证明, 早期除颤可以明显提高心肺复苏的成功率.

sentence.Network_en: Author illuminates the design and realization method of the defibrillation system on hardware and software.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文详细论述了双相波除颤系统软硬件的设计思路和实现方法.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一旦发现，必须立即进行心肺脑复苏和除颤(defibrillation)。  除颤进行越早，效果越好。
Ｄ是指体外去颤（Defibrillation），若前述急救步骤都无效时，就由专业救护人员评估是否需要以自动心脏电击去颤器来抢救。帐号密 …
